about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your gateway to Arab FinTech insights and analysis
about.authorBio: We are a collective of industry experts, analysts, and technologists dedicated to accelerating the growth of the financial technology ecosystem across the Arab world. Through in-depth analysis, regulatory guidance, and market intelligence, we empower innovators and institutions to shape the future of digital finance.

fintechFundamentals.title: Fintech Fundamentals
fintechFundamentals.subtitle: Your Complete Guide to Understanding Fintech in the Saudi Market
fintechFundamentals.description: A comprehensive 4-module learning journey that takes you from understanding the basics of banking and fintech to mastering regulatory compliance and Saudi financial regulations.

overview.title: Why This Course?
overview.description: A course designed specifically for the Saudi market, combining global fintech concepts with local application. You'll learn how banks and fintech companies operate, understand Saudi regulations from SAMA and CMA, and gain practical skills that are in high demand.

comprehensive.title: Saudi Market Focus
comprehensive.description: Tailored content covering local regulations with examples from Saudi companies

practical.title: Practical Applications
practical.description: Case studies from companies like STC Pay, Tamara, and Lendo with interactive exercises

expert.title: Field Experience
expert.description: Learn from specialists who have worked with banks and fintech companies in the Kingdom

phases.title: Course Content
phases.subtitle: A Progressive Journey from Basics to Practical Application

phase1.title: Introduction to Fintech and Banking System
phase1.subtitle: The Foundations Every Specialist Needs
phase1.description: Begin your journey by understanding what fintech is and its scope, and explore the evolution from traditional to digital finance.
topicsList: Traditional Banking System in Saudi Arabia

phase2.title: Regulations and Compliance in Saudi Market
phase2.subtitle: Regulatory Requirements and Frameworks
phase2.description: Master the regulatory requirements for fintech companies in Saudi Arabia.

phase3.title: Core Technologies and Open Banking
phase3.subtitle: How Fintech Actually Works
phase3.description: Move to the practical side and learn technical architecture and Open Banking.

phase4.title: Building Fintech Systems and Market Opportunities
phase4.subtitle: Practical Application and Future Opportunities
phase4.description: Complete your journey by building a simple fintech system and exploring market opportunities.
topicsList: Workshop: Designing a Simple Transfer System
How to Launch a Fintech Company

instructor.title: About the Program
instructor.description: This program is designed by Saudi fintech specialists who combine theoretical and practical expertise in building and operating digital financial products, with a special focus on local market requirements and Saudi regulations.

enrollSection.title: Ready to Launch into the World of Fintech?
enrollSection.description: Join a growing community of fintech enthusiasts and gain the skills demanded in the Saudi job market.
